animes.title: Kingdom 5th Season
animes.author: Studio Pierrot, Studio Signpost
animes.description: The fifth season of Kingdom.
animes.genre: Action, Ancient China, Historical, Male Protagonist, Military, Politics, Seinen, Torture, War

animes.title: Ore dake Level Up na Ken
animes.author: A-1 Pictures, Aniplex, Crunchyroll, D&C MEDIA, Kakao piccoma, Netmarble
animes.description:
They say whatever doesn’t kill you makes you stronger, but that’s not the case for the world’s weakest hunter Sung Jinwoo. After being brutally slaughtered by monsters in a high-ranking dungeon, Jinwoo came back with the System, a program only he could see, that’s leveling him up in every way. Now, he’s inspired to discover the secrets behind his powers and the dungeon that spawned them.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Age Regression, Alternate Universe, Angels, Anti-Hero, Bullying, Cosmic Horror, Cultivation, Dragons, Dungeon, Dystopian, Fantasy, Gore, Heterosexual, Isekai, Magic, Male Protagonist, Necromancy, Post-Apocalyptic, Satire, Shounen, Super Power, Swordplay, Time Manipulation, Tragedy, Travel, Urban Fantasy, War

animes.author: A-1 Pictures, ADK Marketing Solutions, Aniplex, Shueisha
animes.description: The second season of MASHLE, adapting the Divine Visionary Candidate Exam Arc.
animes.genre: Action, Asexual, Battle Royale, Bullying, Chibi, Comedy, Fantasy, Fitness, Food, LGBTQ+ Themes, Magic, Male Protagonist, Parody, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, School, Shounen, Slapstick, Time Manipulation, Witch

animes.title: BUCCHIGIRI?!
animes.author: MAPPA, MAPPA, Toho
animes.description:
Arajin Tomoshibi's reunion with his old pal Matakara Asamine takes an unexpected turn when they stumble into a brawl with the toughest guys in town. And just when you thought things couldn't get weirder, a colossal genie decides to drop in. Brace yourself for the ultimate showdown. It's the clash of the cool and the magical!
 (Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Cute Boys Doing Cute Things, Delinquents, Gangs, Heterosexual, Magic, Male Protagonist, Martial Arts, Mythology, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, School, Supernatural

animes.title: One Room, Hi Atari Futsuu, Tenshi Tsuki.
animes.author: Bushiroad Move, Nikkatsu, Nippon Columbia, Okuruto Noboru
animes.description:
Shintarou Tokumitsu is a high schooler living all alone, but things take an unexpected turn when a girl named Towa shows up on his balcony! Not only is she incredibly pure and sweet, but there’s something different about her—something… divine. Just who is Shintarou’s new roommate, and what adorable high jinks lie in store?!

(Source: Yen Press)
animes.genre: Angels, Comedy, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Female Harem, Heterosexual, Iyashikei, Male Protagonist, Romance, School, Slice of Life, Supernatural

animes.title: Crayon Shin-chan
animes.author: Funimation, Shin-Ei Animation, TV Asahi
animes.description:
Crayon Shin-chan follows the wacky antics and adventures of five-year-old Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his parents, neighbors, and friends and is set in Kasukabe, Saitama Prefecture, Japan.

Many of the jokes in the series stem from Shin-chan's occasionally weird, unnatural and inappropriate use of language, as well as from his inappropriate behavior. A typical gag involves Shin-chan confounding his parents by using the wrong phrase for the occasion; for example, saying "Welcome back!" instead of "I am back!" when he comes home.

During the beginning of the series, the TV show was mostly based on the storyline in the original manga. As the show progressed, more and more episodes became anime-original.
animes.genre: Acting, Comedy, Ecchi, Episodic, Family Life, Gangs, Male Protagonist, School, Seinen, Slice of Life

animes.title: Shimajirou no Wow!
animes.author: Benesse Corporation, TV Setouchi, The Answer Studio
animes.description: Fourth season of the Shimajirou children's television series.
animes.genre: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Kids, Magic

animes.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Divinez
animes.author: Bushiroad, Gift-o’-Animation, Kinema Citrus, Studio JEMI
animes.description:
One day, six cards known as the "Six Desires" were born with the power to change fate.
Six fighters were chosen, and would come to possess those six cards. What awaited them was the “Fated Clash“, where they would fight each other until the end, and the last one standing would have any wish granted. A youth named Akina Myodo, who wants to help his frail sister, participates in the Fated Clash to have his wish granted.


And thus, he throws himself into battles with powerful fighters.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Card Battle, Idol, Time Manipulation

animes.title: Ninjala
animes.author: OLM
animes.description:
The year is 20XX. The ninja, who once forged the history of Japan, were scattered across the country during the Meiji Restoration. As these ninja mingled with the other clans, their bloodline thinned, and they gradually faded from sight. The descendants of these ninja clans, seeking to preserve their heritage, formed the WNA (World Ninja Association) in the hope of carrying on their legacy.


And so it was that the WNA succeeded in developing Ninja-Gum, an art which could summon forth the strength of the Shinobi. And yet creating the most powerful Ninja-Gum requires the strongest of ninja DNA. So it was that the Ninjala Tournament was held, that the mightiest of all ninjas could be found...


(Source: Official Game website)
animes.genre: Action, Age Regression, Aliens, Comedy, Fugitive, Full CGI, Kids, Ninja, Primarily Child Cast, Sci-Fi, Super Power, Urban

animes.title: BONOBONO (2016)
animes.author: Eiken, Glovision
animes.description: A new adaptation of the adventures of three forest friends - a raccoon, a squirrel and a sea otter.
animes.genre: Animals, Comedy, Iyashikei, Kids

animes.title: Snack Basue
animes.author: BS Asahi, Pony Canyon, Sotsu, Studio PuYUKAI, Studio PuYUKAI
animes.description:
Welcome to Snack Basue! Delight yourself in this charming snack bar, just five stations away from Hokkaido's largest downtown area, Susukino. Run by the quirky proprietress, Basue, and her junior hostess, Akemi, the place is filled with laughter and smiles from its oddball regulars and walk-ins as they regale tales of their lives. So, pull up a seat and have a drink—is shochu OK? 

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Bar, Comedy, Episodic, Female Protagonist, Meta, Parody, Primarily Adult Cast, Slapstick, Surreal Comedy

animes.title: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata
animes.author: Bandai Namco Music Live, Capybara, Crunchyroll, Frontier Works, GREE Entertainment, Shin-Ei Animation, Shin-Ei Animation, Studio Add
animes.description:
An ordinary walk home from school turns into an epic journey for Usato. After suddenly being dropped into another world with two fellow students, Usato learns he was summoned there by accident. But things turn around when he discovers a unique aptitude for healing magic! Now, he trains beyond human limitations, using his self-healing abilities to gain absurd strength and unrivaled stamina.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Animals, Demons, Fantasy, Female Harem, Heterosexual, Isekai, Kemonomimi, Magic, Male Protagonist, Military, Swordplay, War

animes.title: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita.
animes.author: ABC Animation, ABC Frontier, BS Asahi, Bandai Namco Music Live, KLOCKWORX, Movic, NetEase Games, Studio Massket, TO Books, TOKYO MX
animes.description:
Stars are everything, granting abilities to Tamers. So when Ivy was born without one, her village took it as an ill omen! Now banished, she leads a lonely life of salvaging rubbish to survive. That is until she befriends Sora, a weak little slime, in the forest. Together, the delicate duo embarks on a heartwarming journey of survival and discovers there’s more to Ivy than being starless.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Adventure, Crossdressing, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Homeless, Isekai, Iyashikei, Magic, Reincarnation, Rural, Survival, Travel

animes.title: Chou Futsuu ken Chiba Densetsu
animes.author: Frontier Works, Super Normal Studio
animes.description: No Description
animes.genre: Comedy, Fantasy

animes.title: Odekake Kozame
animes.author: ENGI, KADOKAWA
animes.description:
The story follows a little shark character, Kozame-chan's adventures in Yauo town, which smells "nostalgic." From radio exercises to festival stalls to meeting with friends, Kozame-chan has a variety of heartwarming experiences in the town. 

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Animals, Anthropomorphism, Episodic, Iyashikei, Kids, Slice of Life, Tragedy

animes.description: A new dream and adventure set throughout the entire Pokémon world unfolds in a brand new Pokémon-series following a girl named Liko and a boy named Roy.
animes.genre: Action, Adoption, Adventure, Animals, Aviation, Ensemble Cast, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Fishing, Found Family, Idol, Kids, Male Protagonist, Musical, Proxy Battle, School, Travel, VTuber

animes.title: Fushigi Dagashiya: Zenitendou
animes.author: Kanaban Graphics, NHK Enterprises, Studio Gallop, Toei Animation
animes.description:
Zenitendo is a mysterious candy store that only lucky people can reach. All the candy recommended by Beniko, the owner of the store, is perfectly suited to the buyer's troubles. However, it depends on whether the candy will be used or eaten correctly that it can bring happiness or misfortune.

(Source: MAL News)
animes.genre: Animals, Full CGI, Kids, Magic, Mystery

animes.title: BEYBLADE X
animes.author: ADK Emotions, OLM, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Bird Kazami, aiming to become a pro Blader, meets former champion Ekusu Kurosu, also known as 'Kamen X', and forms a team so that they can aim for the "top" of the X Tower. But what awaits them is a spectacular battle that no one has ever seen before. The yet unseen 'X'. The super accelerated (Xtreme) Beyblade runs through a new era!


(Source: Official website)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Advertisement, Artificial Intelligence, CGI, Cosplay, Kids, Male Protagonist, Sports, Urban

animes.title: Sore Ike! Anpanman
animes.author: TMS Entertainment
animes.description:
One night, a Star of Life falls down the chimney of a bakery nestled deep in the forest, causing the dough in the oven to come to life. The dough becomes Anpanman, a superhero made of anpan (a sweet roll with bean jam filling). Together with his friends, Anpanman fights his rival Baikinman and helps the malnourished.


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Aliens, Animals, Anthropomorphism, Boxing, Comedy, Drawing, Episodic, Fantasy, Food, Football, Ghost, Henshin, Kaiju, Kids, Magic, Robots, Samurai, Super Power, Superhero, Twins, Witch

animes.title: Chiikawa
animes.author: Doga Kobo
animes.description:
The sometimes happy, sometimes sad, and a tad stressful daily life of "some sort of small, cute creature" known as Chiikawa. Chiikawa enjoys delicious food with bees and rabbits, toils hard every day for the rewards of work, and still maintains a smile.

(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Animals, Comedy, Dystopian, Food, Iyashikei, Kids, Outdoor, Primarily Child Cast, Slice of Life, Surreal Comedy, Work

animes.author: Group TAC, OLM, Xebec
animes.description: Story about Kappa with flowers on their heads.
animes.genre: Comedy, Kids

animes.title: Dokonjou Gaeru Yanen
animes.author: DLE
animes.description: No Description
animes.genre: Comedy

animes.title: Majo to Yajuu
animes.author: BS11, Crunchyroll, Kodansha, MAGNET, NBCUniversal Entertainment Japan, Nichion, TBS, Yokohama Animation Lab
animes.description:
It all started with the 17 "Origins," whose powers were passed down to individuals who still exist around the world today. A man carrying a coffin and a girl with the eyes of a beast appear in a town. The girl was once cursed by a witch and now searches for her in order to undo the curse. Is the witch who appears before them the quarry they've been searching for? And how can the curse be undone? This quest for revenge against an evil witch begins rolling when the beast captures the witch. This magnificent and intense dark fantasy begins now!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Body Swapping, Drama, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Gender Bending, Gore, Magic, Male Protagonist, Necromancy, Nudity, Primarily Adult Cast, Revenge, Seinen, Urban, Urban Fantasy, Vampire, Witch, Zombie

animes.title: Meitou "Isekai no Yu" Kaitaku-ki: AraFou Onsen Mania Tensei-saki wa, Nonbiri Onsen Tengoku Deshita
animes.author: BloomZ, BloomZ, Future Leap, Gekkou, WWWave, WolfsBane, WolfsBane
animes.description: Yoshizou Yukawa is a passionate hot springs enthusiast—a hot springs hunter who was able to sniff out the source of springs. One day, while searching for a hidden hot spring to revitalize a town, he slips off a cliff and dies. He is then reincarnated into another world by an Inari deity of a small shrine hidden in the rocks. Yoshizou is joined by Inari's messenger princess, Mayudama. The hot spring hunter within Yoshizou is stirred right away, as he takes a bath with Mayudama in the hot spring he just discovered. Then, an elf girl appears...
animes.genre: Ecchi, Elf, Environmental, Fantasy, Isekai, Iyashikei, Kemonomimi, Magic, Monster Girl, Nudity

animes.title: Kamisama Hajimemashita
animes.author: DAX Production, Dentsu, Funimation, Hakusensha, Pony Canyon, Sotsu, TMS Entertainment, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Nanami Momozono is alone and homeless after her dad skips town to evade his gambling debts and the debt collectors kick her out of her apartment. So when a man she's just saved from a dog offers her his home, she jumps at the opportunity. But it turns out that his place is a shrine, and Nanami has unwittingly taken over his job as a local deity! 

Nanami has all kinda of new responsibilities she doesn't understand, dangers she's unaware of, and a cranky ex-familiar who's... actually pretty hot. What's a new-fledged godling to do? 

(Source: Viz Media)
animes.genre: Age Gap, Anthropomorphism, Bullying, Comedy, Demons, Episodic, Fantasy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gods, Heterosexual, Kemonomimi, Love Triangle, Male Harem, Meta, Monster Boy, Romance, School, Shoujo, Slavery, Supernatural, Time Manipulation, Tsundere, Urban Fantasy, Youkai

animes.title: Accel World
animes.author: ASCII Media Works, Genco, Rakuonsha, Sunrise, Viz Media, Warner Bros. Japan, flying DOG
animes.description:
The year is 2046. Haruyuki Arita is a young boy who finds himself on the lowest social rungs of his school. Ashamed of his miserable life, Haruyuki can only cope by indulging in virtual games. But that all changes when Kuroyukihime, the most popular girl in school, introduces him to a mysterious program called Brain Burst and a virtual reality called the Accel World. 

(Source: VIZ Media)
animes.genre: Action, Augmented Reality, Bullying, Henshin, Heterosexual, Isekai, Kuudere, Love Triangle, Male Protagonist, Motorcycles, Netorare, Philosophy, Primarily Teen Cast, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Tokusatsu, Video Games, Virtual World

animes.title: World Trigger
animes.author: TV Asahi, Toei Animation
animes.description:
One day, a gate to another world suddenly opens in Mikado City. Aliens invincible to Earth’s weapons, called “Neighbors”, start coming over. Earth’s only line of defense is a mysterious group called the “Border” who are armed with weapons called “Triggers”.
 
Four years later, the city has recovered from initial attacks and citizens of Mikado City have started to get use to the Neighbor’s attacks. Yuma Kuga, a transfer student, and his classmate Osamu Mikumo find themselves fighting a Neighbor that suddenly appears. Osamu, who is actually a Border agent, activates his Trigger but is unable to defeat it. This leaves Yuma to activate his own Trigger and defeat the alien. Yuma reveals that he is not part of Border and is actually a Neighbor who has transferred from the other side.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Aliens, Battle Royale, Ensemble Cast, Guns, Isekai, Male Protagonist, Military, Primarily Teen Cast, Robots, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Supernatural, Swordplay, Tragedy

animes.title: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterun da.
animes.author: A-1 Pictures
animes.description:
Jun is a girl whose words have been sealed away. She was once a very happy girl, but because of a certain thing she said when she was very young, her family was torn apart. One day, the egg fairy appeared in front of her and sealed away her ability to talk in order to stop her from hurting anybody else. Since this traumatic experience, Jun lives in the shadows away from the limelight. But, one day, she is nominated to become an executive member of the "community outreach council." On top of that, Jun is also appointed to play the main lead in their musical...

(Source: Official website)
animes.genre: Baseball, Chuunibyou, Coming of Age, Drama, Family Life, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Love Triangle, Music, Musical, Rehabilitation, Romance, School, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

animes.title: HELLO WORLD
animes.author: Graphinica
animes.description: In Kyoto in the year 2027, Naomi Katagaki, a male high school student encounters a person who is claiming to be Naomi from 10 years in the future. Together, they must change the future and save a classmate, Ruri, whom the younger Naomi starts to date in three months.
animes.genre: Age Regression, Alternate Universe, Augmented Reality, Coming of Age, Drama, Female Protagonist, Full CGI, Heterosexual, Kuudere, Magic, Male Protagonist, Psychological, Rehabilitation, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Tragedy, Urban, Virtual World

animes.title: Kono Sekai no Katasumi ni
animes.author: Animatsu Entertainment, Genco, MAPPA
animes.description:
The story follows a young lady named Suzu Urano, who in 1944 moves to the small town of Kure in Hiroshima to live with her husband's family. Suzu's life is thrown into chaos when her town is bombed during World War II. Her perseverance and courage underpin this heart-warming and inspirational tale of the everyday challenges faced by the Japanese in the midst of a violent, war-torn country. This beautiful yet poignant tale shows that even in the face of adversity and loss, people can come together and rebuild their lives.

(Source: Shout! Factory)
animes.genre: Disability, Drama, Drawing, Family Life, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Historical, Rehabilitation, Seinen, Slice of Life, Tragedy, War

animes.title: Leadale no Daichi nite
animes.author: Bandai Namco Arts, Crunchyroll, KADOKAWA, Kadokawa Media House, Maho Film, Simplicity, Sun Television
animes.description:
After being put on life support after a tragic accident, Keina Kagami's only freedom comes from the VRMMO RPG Leadale. One day her life support system shuts off and Keina passes away. When she wakes up, she finds herself in Leadale two hundred years in the future. As the high elf Cayna, with lost skills but incredible stats, she must forge relationships with the residents of this new world... which, shockingly, include the ""children"" characters she designed herself! A leisurely adventure tale is about to begin, featuring a girl transported to a game world and the smiles and tears she shares with her quirky companions!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Adoption, Adventure, Chibi, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Elf, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Gender Bending, Isekai, Iyashikei, Magic, Mermaid, Primarily Female Cast, Super Power, Travel, Video Games, Virtual World, Zombie

animes.title: Subarashiki Kono Sekai The Animation
animes.author: Domerica, Shin-Ei Animation, Square Enix
animes.description:
Neku awakens in the middle of Shibuya's bustling Scramble Crossing with no memory of how he got there. Little does he know, he's been transported to an alternate plane of existence known as the Underground (UG). Now an unwilling participant in the mysterious "Reapers' Game," Neku must partner up with a girl named Shiki in order to survive. Together, they complete missions and defeat monsters known as "Noise" as they gradually uncover the true nature of this twisted Game.


"There's only one way to stay alive in Shibuya: trust your partner." Will they survive the Reapers' Game?


(Source: Official Site)
animes.genre: Action, Afterlife, Amnesia, Angels, CGI, Coming of Age, Death Game, Hikikomori, Male Protagonist, Memory Manipulation, Rehabilitation, Supernatural, Survival, Tragedy, Urban, Urban Fantasy

animes.title: Accel World EX
animes.author: Sunrise
animes.description:
OVA bundled with the Accel World simulation and action games.  The Blu-ray OVA discs came with the PS3 limited edition versions and the DVD with the PSP limited edition versions.

The project was split into two PSP and PS3 titles, and one episode was released with each game:
#EX01: Reverberation;Zankyou (bundled with Stage:01 Ginyoku no Kakusei)
#EX02: Vacation;Onsen (bundled with Stage:02 Kasoku no Chouten)
animes.genre: Action, Isekai, Kuudere, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Virtual World

animes.title: Animatrix
animes.author: DNA, Horipro, MADHOUSE, Square Enix, Square Pictures, Studio 4°C, Warner Bros. Japan
animes.description:
1. Final Flight of the Osiris
The crew of the Osiris discover an army preparing to invade Zion. While one crew member races inside the Matrix to get the message to Zion, the others try desperately to buy her enough time while fighting off an onslaught of Sentinels they can't possibly defeat.

2-3. The Second Renaissance Part 1 and 2
Humans have created the ultimate AI, which is just as smart as they are. But complications arise when these robots and the humans try to exist peacefully, and eventually all-out war breaks out. The humans ultimately lose the war, and become trapped in the Matrix as seen in the live-action films.

4. Kid's Story
A young man discovers that his world isn't real, that it's a computer-generated fantasy land created by robots using humans for energy. He escapes with the help of the hacker Neo. Based on the Matrix trilogy. 

5. Program
Cis and Duo engage in battle in a virtual recreation of Feudal Japan. 

6. World Record
While running the fastest race in his life, a champion track star breaks free of his computer-generated world for a small period of time. When he goes back to the real world, he has no memories and is placed in a nursing home. Based on the Matrix trilogy.

7. Beyond
While looking for her lost pet, a young woman meets up with some kids in Tokyo to play in a "haunted house", which is really a glitch in their computer world. Based on the Matrix trilogy.

8. Detective Story
A detective named Ash is called upon by a mysterious organization to hunt down the notorious hacker Trinity.

9. Matriculated
A group of scientists capture a robot and place it in a surreal fantasy world. When the robot's friends come in and kill most of the scientists, however, the robot and the last scientist remaining face isolation in the computer-generated world. Based on the Matrix trilogy.


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Action, Anthology, Artificial Intelligence, CGI, Cyberpunk, Denpa, Drama, Dystopian, Gore, Nudity, POV, Psychological, Robots, Sci-Fi, Skateboarding, Virtual World, War

animes.title: Hetalia World Series
animes.author: Frontier Works, Funimation, Studio DEEN
animes.description:
The third and fourth seasons of the Hetalia Axis Powers anime. A continuation of the first 2 seasons under a new name, still adapting the online webcomics drawn by Himaruya Hidekaz.

Based on a popular web-released manga series by Hidekazu Himaruya, this has been described as a "cynical gag" story set in Europe in the years between WW1 and WW2 (1915-1939), using exaggerated caricatures of the different nationalities as portrayed by a gaggle of bishōnen. For example, the Italia Veneziano character is into pasta and women. The Deutsche (German) bishi loves potatoes and sausages, and Nippon is an otaku boy. Installments of the manga have jumped back and forth in setting from the ancient times to modern-day geopolitics. The manga's title comes the Japanese words for "useless" (hetare) and Italy (Italia).

(Source: ANI)
animes.genre: Chibi, Comedy, Cute Boys Doing Cute Things, Educational, Ensemble Cast, Historical, Parody, Primarily Male Cast

animes.title: Another World
animes.description:
The story features the point of view of the Naomi from 10 years in the future.

Episodes:
1. Record 2027 (2019/09/13)
2. Record 2032 (2019/09/27)
3. Record 2036 (2019/10/04)
animes.genre: Full CGI, Kuudere, Sci-Fi

animes.title: Glass no Hana to Kowasu Sekai
animes.author: A-1 Pictures, Pony Canyon
animes.description:
A floating space without gravity where an infinite number of lights shine in different colors: The "Box of Wisdom." Inside of this box, there are multiple worlds, multiple timelines, and there used to be many different people. This is where Dual and Dorothy were fighting with enemies called "Viruses." Worlds infected by viruses must be erased. That is the duty, the job of these girls. However, one day, Dual and Dorothy feel the presence of a new Virus. Arriving at the scene, they see a girl being attacked by Viruses. After saving the girl, the duo wait for her to awaken so they can ask who she is, where she came from, and where she is going. Finally, when the girl opened her eyes, she gave her name, Rimo, and whispered only one sentence... "I must return to the flower patch..."


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Amnesia, Artificial Intelligence, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Drama, Female Protagonist, Mahou Shoujo, Mystery, Philosophy, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Female Cast, Sci-Fi, Tragedy, Virtual World

animes.description: Picture drama specials bundled with the main series' Blu-ray/DVD volumes.
animes.genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Kuudere, Supernatural

animes.title: Aoi Sekai no Chuushin de
animes.author: DAX Production, Fifth Avenue
animes.description: Segua Kingdom has been losing the war against Ninterdo Empire but the tables are turned by the appearance of a boy called Gear. All the characters are parodies of Nintendo or Sega games such as Sonic the Hedgehog, Super Mario Bros., The Legend of Zelda etc.
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Ecchi, Fantasy, Parody, Shounen, Super Power

animes.title: Accel World: Acchel World.
animes.author: J.C. Staff, Viz Media
animes.description: Spin-off of Accel World included on the Accel World Blu-rays & DVDs.
animes.genre: Comedy, Ensemble Cast, Isekai, Kuudere, Parody, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Virtual World

animes.title: Major: World Series
animes.author: SynergySP
animes.description:
According to Weekly Shonen Sunday, a new OVA of manga "Major" was announced to be released in December. The World Series chapter, which was skipped in the TV series, will be animated. This OVA will be the final anime of Major.

(Source: Scan of WSS)
animes.genre: Baseball, Comedy, Drama, Sports

animes.title: Sweat Punch
animes.author: Horipro, Studio 4°C
animes.description:
Sweat Punch is a series of five Studio 4°C shorts collected as a direct-to-DVD package film entitled Deep Imagination.

1. Tanpetori Kyouju no Yuuutsu (タンペトリー教授の憂鬱, Professor Dan Petory's Blues)
A musical number starring a hand puppet named Junior. The puppet is controlled by the drunken Professor Dan Petory who explains in puppetry the answers to such questions as why the Earth is blue and why UFOs fly in a zig-zag pattern.

2. End of the World
"End of the World" is a science fiction story about a young alien girl named Yuko as she escapes from the world of humans. After meeting Kazumi, a human girl Yuko met at a rock concert, the girls head to Kazumi's apartment. Before Yuko even takes off her shoes, however, she leaves through Kazumi's TV with her trusty cybernetic steed FACE to wage a retaliatory campaign against hordes of S&M monsters from another dimension, and the evil queen of Yuko's world.

3. Kigeki (喜劇, Comedy)
Set during the Irish War of Independence, a five-year old girl goes out in search of the mysterious Demon’s Castle - home of the Black Knight whose services she hopes to recruit. The Black Knight is a dark, young, skilled swordsman who will only accept a particular genre of books as advance payment.

4. Higan (彼岸, Enlightenment)
An injured man lies completely still in a hospital room with doctors hovering at his bedside, appearing serene and peaceful as he slowly succumbs to death. However, in his own mind, memories of a recent battle vividly flash by. Thoughts of death and chaos haunt him, even in his final moments.

5. Garakuta no Machi (ガラクタの町, Junk Town)
One summer day, a young boy encounters a little robot at a shopping arcade-a hungry little robot, it turns out, as he devours one machine after the other, growing in size with each "meal". This story of a boy, a machine, and their little adventure is the tale of an unusual friendship, enriched by the details of daily life and seen through the director's unique visual style.

(Source: Studio 4°C website)
animes.genre: Action, Aliens, Anthology, CGI, Demons, Fantasy, Historical, Horror, Mecha, Music, Musical, Real Robot, Sci-Fi, War

animes.title: World Dai Star
animes.author: Bandai Namco Filmworks, Bandai Namco Music Live, Daito Giken, EGG FIRM, GREE Entertainment, Good Smile Company, Hawkeye, Lantis, Lerche, Studio Hibari
animes.description:
Theater has taken the entire world by storm in the 20th century, and teenager Kokona Ohtori aims to take the big stage. Performers who shine the brightest are called Dai Stars, and for Kokona, her first step into stardom is auditioning for the prominent theater troupe—Sirius. As she cultivates her unique sense for the stage, a story of passion and aspiration unfolds in this super-theater age.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Acting, Chuunibyou, Dissociative Identities, Female Protagonist, Idol, Music, Musical, Ojou-sama, Primarily Female Cast, Super Power, Tsundere

animes.title: Yoru no Kuni
animes.author: studio daisy
animes.description:
An animation project directed by Ryouchimo (Ryo-timo), made as a companion piece to Aimer's album "Walpurgis".


The list of released videos included in this entry are as follows:

Night 1: The 22 O'clock Guide (第1夜 -22時の案内人-), Apr 16, 2021. 
Night 2: The 26 O'clock Search (第2夜 -26時の探し物-), Jun 4, 2021. 
Night 3: The 4 O'clock Letter (第3夜 -4時の手紙-), Sept 12, 2021.
animes.genre: Coming of Age, Episodic, Fairy Tale, Fantasy, Iyashikei, Primarily Female Cast, Tragedy

animes.title: Arata naru Sekai: Mirai-hen
animes.author: ASCII Media Works, Aniplex, Kadokawa Shoten, MADHOUSE
animes.description:
Four high school girls in uniforms walk silently on the barren earth. These girls are time travelers who had been sent 6000 years into the future, from their present in which the same day is endlessly repeated, in order to evade human extinction.

They studied time travel in school, were examined by the aptitude test, and were sent to the future as told. What should they do now? They had no idea. The only thing they could take with them from the present was a light, toy-like cellphone. Of course, it receives no signal here.

As the girls are walking, they see strange birds flying in the sky, and a discolored river in the distance.

Then, one girl finds an abandoned house, and recognizes the name inscribed on the front gates.
animes.genre: Dystopian, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Female Cast, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Time Skip

animes.title: Sekai no Yami Zukan
animes.author: ILCA
animes.description:
The anime will be in an omnibus short format that will tell stories of the strange and bizarre in our world, including UFOs, cryptids, curses, ancient civilizations, supernatural powers, spiritual experiences, bizarre cases, different dimensions, and urban legends, told in a picture show style.


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Achromatic, Aliens, Cars, Episodic, Gore, Horror, Robots, Supernatural

animes.title: Beautiful World
animes.author: Studio Khara
animes.description: A music video directed by Tsurumaki Kazuya to promote the movies of Rebuild of Evangelion and the main music theme, "Beautiful World." The video includes both new animation and animation from the film.
animes.genre: Action, Cyberpunk, Drama, Mecha, Sci-Fi

animes.title: Narue no Sekai
animes.author: Central Park Media, Imagica, Lantis, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Media Factory, Pony Canyon, Studio Live
animes.description:
Meet Narue, an adorable schoolgirl with a secret. She's really an alien with powers right out of a sci-fi comic! But growing up is never easy, and sometimes it doesn't help when you're from outer space. Join our spunky heroine as she faces androids, alien invaders, and her first date with the boy next door. It's the sci-fi comedy that's a direct hit to your heart!

(Source: Central Park Media)
animes.genre: Aliens, Artificial Intelligence, Bullying, Comedy, Cosplay, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Male Protagonist, Robots, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Virtual World

animes.title: BIRTH
animes.author: ADV Films, Kaname Production, Victor Entertainment
animes.description: Aqualoid was a prosperous planet, but an attack from a mysterious life force, the Inorganics, transforms it into a post-apocalyptic shell of its former self. When Nam finds a mysterious sword, he is suddenly the object of a planet-wide chase. With the Inorganics closing in, will Nam and his friends discover the secret of the sword and save their world? Or will they destroy Aqualoid in favor of a new Birth?
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Afterlife, Aliens, Aviation, Comedy, Desert, Ensemble Cast, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Guns, Lost Civilization, Mecha, Psychological, Reincarnation, Robots, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Space

animes.title: The Perfect World
animes.description: Official music video for B: The Beginning's ending theme song The Perfect World. Performed by Marty Friedman feat. Jean-Ken Johnny, KenKen. The music video was released on the music producer Avex's official YouTube channel and it promotes the anime's image album soundtrack going on sale March 7, 2018--only 5 days after the anime is released.
animes.genre: Amnesia, Fugitive, Male Protagonist, Police, Revenge

animes.title: Ningyo no Kizu
animes.author: MADHOUSE
animes.description:
Legend has it that when you eat the flesh of a mermaid, you would live forever. Yuta and Mana are living proof of this... Together, they journey to various places trying to find meaning for their existence, or perhaps even a "cure" for their situation. One day, Yuta and Mana meet Masato, a little boy who seems terrified of his mother Misa. It seems to Yuta and Mana that mother and son have a very unusual relationship. What happens when Yuta and Mana decide to discover the dark secret Masato and Misa are hiding? And what about those monster-like creatures that have been appearing?

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Body Horror, Drama, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Gore, Horror, Male Protagonist, Mermaid, Mystery, Mythology, Primarily Adult Cast

animes.title: Warau Hyouteki
animes.author: Studio Pierrot
animes.description:
Yuzuru was an average teenager who had almost forgotten that he was betrothed to Azusa when he was only 6! Now arriving to claim what she feels is rightfully hers, only Satomi (Yuzuru's current girl friend) stands in her way... and with the mysterious and frightening powers that Azusa brings, Satomi won't stand in her way for long!

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Archery, Demons, Horror, Love Triangle, Mystery, Psychological, Rape, Romance, School, School Club, Shounen, Supernatural, Yandere

animes.title: Takahashi Rumiko Anthology
animes.author: TV Tokyo, Tokyo Movie Shinsha
animes.description:
Rumic World TV (2003) consists of thirteen independent series based on short stories from 1987-2000 by Takahashi Rumiko. The episode order is not sorted based on the year the story was written. For example, the first episode "Tragedy of P"'s story was written in 1991 while the last episode "Senmuno inu"'s story was written in 1994.

(Source: AnimeNfo)
animes.genre: Anthology, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Shounen, Slice of Life, Supernatural

animes.title: The Supergal
animes.author: OB Planning, Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions, Studio Pierrot
animes.description:
Despite being a refugee from an extinct planet, having an alcoholic as a father and an airhead for a mother, Maris' biggest problem is that she's a Thanatosian. Considering that Thanatosians are six times stronger than the average Earthling it shouldn't be such a curse, especially in a galaxy where violence is rife. But the accidental destruction she wreaks on everything she touches —even with the exotic alloy restraints she wears— means she's constantly in debt. Every mission she's assigned to by the Inter-Galactic Space Patrol becomes a cash-drain when all the damages are docked from her wage. 

But when she's selected to rescue the rich and sexy Kogane Maru it's like a dream come true. After setting him free from the terror of his ruthless kidnapper his eternal gratitude will surely guarantee marriage —and an end to all her financial headaches. 

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Action, Aliens, Comedy, Female Protagonist, Nudity, Sci-Fi, Space, Super Power, Wrestling
